text: walilah wahdah yasjud khadeana mnqadana kull man fi alsamawat wal'ardi, fayasjid wayakhdae lah almuminun tweana wakhtyarana, wayakhdae lah alkafirun rghmana eanhama; li'anahum yastakbirun ean eibadatih, wahalihim wafataratuhum tkdhdhibhm fi dhalika, watanqad lieizmatih zilal almakhluqati, fatataharak bi'iiradatih 'awal alnahar wakharaha
